Name: Sweet Dew Berry - Lv.1
Description2$english: Made from fresh fruit and baked in a coating of sparkling honey, these sugar-glazed treats offer a crisp and sweet taste.

recipes.Name: Sweet Dew Berry
recipes.Des:
Crafting results in either products Lv.1 or Lv.2 with a 50% chance.
Fresh fruit is glazed in shimmering honey and gently roasted into crystalline sugar spheres, each bite offering a whisper of delicate sweetness.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting results in either products Lv.1 or Lv.2 with a 50% chance.
Fresh fruit is glazed in shimmering honey and gently roasted into crystalline sugar spheres, each bite offering a whisper of delicate sweetness.
